name: emscripten-modules
description: - This repo consists of C++ files compiled with the `-sMODULARIZE` tag, so that >1 WASM modules can be loaded at once in a page.

scripts.build: npm run build1 & npm run build2 & npm run build3 && npm run append_fncall
scripts.build-o3: npm run build1  -- -O3& npm run build2  -- -O3& npm run build3 -- -O3 && npm run append_fncall
scripts.build-oz: npm run build1  -- -Oz& npm run build2  -- -Oz& npm run build3 -- -Oz && npm run append_fncall
